cta_section.title: Ready to digitize your restaurant?

hero.badge: The #1 Restaurant Platform for West Africa
hero.title: Transform your restaurant with digital menus
hero.subtitle: Create beautiful QR code menus, manage orders, accept mobile payments, and track deliveries - all in one platform built for African restaurants.

features_page.title: Powerful Features for Modern Restaurants
features_page.subtitle: Everything you need to run your restaurant efficiently, from digital menus to delivery management.

menu.title: Digital Menu Management
menu.description: Create beautiful, scannable menus that your customers will love

qr.title: QR Code Menus
qr.description: Generate unique QR codes that customers scan to view your menu instantly on their phones.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Change prices, add items, or mark items as sold out - updates appear instantly.

photos.title: Photo Gallery
photos.description: Upload beautiful photos of your dishes to entice customers.

categories.title: Categories & Modifiers
categories.description: Organize your menu with categories and add customization options for each item.

multilang.title: Multi-language Support
multilang.description: Offer your menu in French, English, and more languages coming soon.

pos.title: Point of Sale System
pos.description: A complete POS system designed for the realities of African restaurants

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Keep taking orders even when the internet goes down. Syncs automatically when back online.

orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Handle dine-in, takeaway, and delivery orders from one dashboard.

kitchen.title: Kitchen Display System
kitchen.description: Real-time order queue for your kitchen staff with WebSocket updates.

receipts.title: Digital Receipts
receipts.description: Generate PDF receipts for customers and keep digital records.

payments.title: Mobile Money Payments
payments.description: Accept the payment methods your customers actually use

wave.title: Wave
wave.description: Accept Wave payments directly in your app.

orange.title: Orange Money
orange.description: Integrated Orange Money support for seamless payments.

mtn.title: MTN MoMo
mtn.description: MTN Mobile Money integration for Ghana and other markets.

cash.title: Cash Management
cash.description: Cash drawer sessions with opening/closing reconciliation.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Process full or partial refunds easily.

delivery.title: Delivery Management
delivery.description: Complete delivery tracking from kitchen to customer

zones.title: Delivery Zones
zones.description: Define delivery areas with polygon boundaries and automatic fee calculation.

drivers.title: Driver Management
drivers.description: Track driver locations in real-time and assign orders automatically.

tracking.title: Customer Tracking
tracking.description: Share live tracking links so customers can follow their delivery.

proof.title: Proof of Delivery
proof.description: Capture photos or signatures as proof of delivery.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Understand your business with powerful analytics

views.title: Menu Views
views.description: Track how many people view your menu and which items are popular.

sales.title: Sales Reports
sales.description: Daily, weekly, and monthly sales breakdowns.

items.title: Item Performance
items.description: See which menu items are bestsellers and which need attention.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Never run out of ingredients again

tracking.title: Stock Tracking
tracking.description: Track inventory levels for all ingredients with multiple units.

recipes.title: Recipe Mapping
recipes.description: Link menu items to ingredients for automatic deduction.

alerts.title: Low Stock Alerts
alerts.description: Get notified when ingredients are running low.

audit.title: Audit Trail
audit.description: Complete history of all stock movements.

pricing_page.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for getting started with digital menus

essential.name: Essential
essential.description: For restaurants ready to remove branding

trial.a: Yes! All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

cancel.a: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept mobile money (Wave, Orange Money, MTN MoMo), credit cards, and bank transfers.

upgrade.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade.a: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

currency.q: Can I pay in local currency?
currency.a: Yes! We accept payments in XOF, XAF, GHS, NGN, and USD.

use_cases.title: Built for Every Type of Restaurant
use_cases.subtitle: See how restaurants like yours use BIZ360 to serve customers better

restaurant.title: Restaurants
restaurant.subtitle: Full-service dining establishments
restaurant.description: From casual dining to fine restaurants, BIZ360 helps you manage your menu, take orders, and delight customers.
benefits: Real-time menu updates for daily specials
restaurant.quote: We reduced our menu printing costs by 80% and customers love scanning the QR code.

cafe.title: Cafes & Coffee Shops
cafe.subtitle: Quick service and specialty drinks
cafe.description: Perfect for high-volume cafes that need fast ordering and quick menu changes for seasonal specials.
benefits: Quick order entry for fast service
cafe.quote: The offline mode is a lifesaver. We never miss an order even when internet is spotty.

hotel.title: Hotels & Resorts
hotel.subtitle: Room service and restaurant operations
hotel.description: Manage multiple outlets, room service, and restaurant operations from one platform.
hotel.quote: Managing our restaurant, pool bar, and room service from one dashboard has transformed our operations.

foodtruck.title: Food Trucks
foodtruck.subtitle: Mobile food service
foodtruck.description: Built for mobility - works offline, accepts mobile payments, and updates menus on the go.
foodtruck.quote: I update my menu from my phone while setting up at different locations. So convenient!

darkKitchen.title: Dark Kitchens
darkKitchen.subtitle: Delivery-only operations
darkKitchen.description: Optimized for delivery-only restaurants with powerful driver management and tracking.
darkKitchen.quote: The delivery tracking feature keeps our customers informed and reduces support calls.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.subtitle: Event and bulk orders
catering.description: Handle large orders, manage inventory for events, and coordinate deliveries for catering businesses.
catering.quote: We can now handle multiple events simultaneously without losing track of orders.

features.title: What you'll see in the demo

testimonials.title: Loved by Restaurants Across West Africa
testimonials.subtitle: See what restaurant owners are saying about BIZ360

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect with the tools you already use

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower African restaurants with world-class technology that works in local conditions.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: BIZ360 was born from a simple observation: restaurants in West Africa deserve the same powerful tools as restaurants anywhere in the world, but adapted for local realities like intermittent internet, mobile money payments, and French-speaking markets.

offline.title: Offline-First
offline.description: We build for unreliable internet because that's reality for many businesses.

local.title: Local-First
local.description: Mobile money, local currencies, and languages that matter here.

simple.title: Simple-First
simple.description: Technology should make life easier, not harder.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
